Grouped_Utterances: Hi, Ellie! It was good. I actually had that conversation with my manager, and it went better than I expected! I felt relieved and supported. It was nice to know they care about my well-being. That’s wonderful to hear! It sounds like you took a significant step in managing your anxiety. Have you noticed any changes in your stress levels since then? Yes, I feel less stressed overall. I’ve been able to focus better on my work. I think it’s just been busy with work, and I haven’t made time to see friends. I miss hanging out with them. I guess I have this fear that they’ll be too busy or that I won’t have anything interesting to say. I think I’ll reach out to my friend Sarah. We used to hang out a lot. I’m a bit nervous but also excited. I really miss our time together.
Yes, I’ve been meditating daily. It really helps me stay calm and focused. I’ve started incorporating guided meditations, which help me stay focused.
Yes, I’d like to invite a friend to grab coffee or lunch. That sounds doable. I’ll try to do it later today.
